name: Xcel Axis 4/3mm Full-body Wetsuit - Women's
description: Extend your surf season with this full-body Xcel wetsuit. 4mm neoprene in key heat-loss zones provides awesome insulation to keep you warm. 3mm panelling in high-motion areas won’t get in the way when you’re paddling past the break or catching a wave.4mm neoprene keeps your core warm. Lighter 3mm panelling at extremities increases mobility.Xcel Nanoprene Lite uses earth-mined limestone instead of petrochemicals to reduce the suit's carbon footprint.Collar is made of durable nylon.Plush Thermo Lite traps warmth around your torso.Watertight zipper prevents flushing.Stress-points are taped to spread the load and prevent premature wear.Glued and blind-stitched seams to increase durability.Back zipper.Recommended for use in water temperatures from 11 to 16˚C.
